content:
All materials are ready,
The construction team is on site,
<color=#8AAB4B>Tomorrow</color>, you'll see <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color>'s home completely transformed!

All materials and construction crews are ready,
<color=#8AAB4B>Tomorrow</color>, everything will be set,
Then, <color=#8AAB4B>{NPC}</color> can move in!
